title: Slovenia Gross Household Saving Rate
description: Household Saving Rate in Slovenia increased to 17.65 percent in the second quarter of 2022 from 14.13 percent in the first quarter of 2022. Personal Savings in Slovenia averaged 13.66 percent from 2005 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 30.20 percent in the fourth quarter of 2020 and a record low of 5.15 percent in the third quarter of 2011. This page provides - Slovenia Gross Household Saving Rate - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: EUROSTAT
